txt.en: The sword-hilt appears to be of Westernesse-make, but the blade has been overlaid with faint writings in Black Speech. Among the faded writings, you can make out the name Innis.\n\nYou should take the blade to Nethraw at the Krúslë Lannan to the east of Gabilshathûr.

'It is well that you brought this to me, [placeholder], for few save the Wise now would have been able to discern the faded lines that speak the cold words of the Black Speech which tainted this blade.  \n\n'This is the sword of Innis, though his sword was not as famed as his bow.  Many were caught unaware by the ambushes of Innis and the cruel Hillmen he commanded.'
You have recovered one of the seven swords of Krúslë Lannan.
Bring the Sword of Innis to Nethraw
Nethraw can be found at the Krúslë Lannan, east of Gabilshathûr.\n\nYou should take the sword you found to Nethraw.
